about_the_game:
Do you like Romance? Comedy? Adven- SQUIRRELS!

You’re a squirrel at a vacation park, here to chill out and meet some other squirrels. You start out at the Great Squirrel Log where you can grab a bite to eat, sip on a Squirltale, and maybe meet some locals. There's 5 fuzzy tailed-bachelors just waiting for you to get to know them.

After getting to know a bit about the bachelors you can choose which whimsical and romantic date to go on. Where ever you may end up be careful of what you say. Actions have consequences and all squirrels have feelings. 

                                      

Nuts For You is a comedic dating sim where you play as a squirrel in a park and have the choice to date one of five squirrel bachelors. Choices matter and change the outcome of the game.

There are ten possible endings five good endings and five bad endings. Each choice you make has the opportunity to push you towards one of the good or bad endings. All five of the squirrel bachelors have their own routes you can go down and try to get the good ending will, each have their own unique storyline and backstory that is revealed through the game.

                                       

  • Character Creation: There are multiple hats you can choose from to decorate your character.

  • Original Art: Amazing character art and backgrounds pull the story of Nuts For You together creating the best experience.

  • Original Soundtrack: The emotional soundtrack helps bring the story to life and immerse the player.

  • Comedic Story: Nuts For You at it's core is a comedy, pushing the common tropes of dating sims and giving players a good laugh.

  • Short n' Sweet: While Nuts For You isn't a long game it's a memorable one with many opportunities to go back and play it again to get another ending.

short_description: Choose a whimsical date between five squirrelly bachelors. In this dating sim you are a wonderful squirrel who, in looking for some adventure, finds love instead. Five fuzzy squirrels who are Nuts for You.
